description: Try our easy to follow Chilli Crab recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chilli Crab Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs fresh root ginger, finely chopped
2 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large wok or frying pan. Add the crab claws and cook for about 2 minutes until bright red. Remove from the pan and set aside. Add the garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 30 seconds, then add the chillies followed by the tomatoes, soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, sugar and vinegar. Simmer for 10 minutes, adding a little water if necessary.

Return the crab to the pan and cook for a further 5 minutes until cooked through. Mix together the cornflour and measurement water until smooth. Stir into the pan and cook for 1 minute until the sauce is slightly thickened. Scatter over the spring onions and serve with plain rice.
